Commands.Name: deploy
Commands.HelpText: Deploy a new multi-target app or sync changes to an existing one

UsageDetails.Usage:
Deploy a multi-target app archive
   cf deploy MTA [-e EXT_DESCRIPTOR[,...]] [-t TIMEOUT] [--version-rule VERSION_RULE] [-u URL] [-f] [--retries RETRIES] [--no-start] [--namespace NAMESPACE] [--delete-services] [--delete-service-keys] [--delete-service-brokers] [--keep-files] [--no-restart-subscribed-apps] [--do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions] [--abort-on-error] [--verify-archive-signature] [--strategy STRATEGY] [--skip-testing-phase] [--skip-idle-start]

   Perform action on an active deploy operation
   cf deploy -i OPERATION_ID -a ACTION [-u URL]

   (EXPERIMENTAL) Deploy a multi-target app archive referenced by a remote URL
   <write MTA archive URL to STDOUT> | cf deploy [-e EXT_DESCRIPTOR[,...]] [-t TIMEOUT] [--version-rule VERSION_RULE] [-u MTA_CONTROLLER_URL] [--retries RETRIES] [--no-start] [--namespace NAMESPACE] [--delete-services] [--delete-service-keys] [--delete-service-brokers] [--keep-files] [--no-restart-subscribed-apps] [--do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions] [--abort-on-error] [--verify-archive-signature] [--strategy STRATEGY] [--skip-testing-phase] [--skip-idle-start]

Options.-abort-on-error: Auto-abort the process on any errors
Options.-all-modules: Deploy all modules which are contained in the deployment descriptor, in the current location
Options.-all-resources: Deploy all resources which are contained in the deployment descriptor, in the current location
Options.-delete-service-keys: Delete existing service keys and apply the new ones
Options.-delete-services: Recreate changed services / delete discontinued services
Options.-do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions: Do not fail on missing permissions for admin operations
Options.-namespace: (EXPERIMENTAL) Namespace for the mta, applied to app and service names as well
Options.-no-restart-subscribed-apps: Do not restart subscribed apps, updated during the deployment
Options.-retries: Retry the operation N times in case a non-content error occurs (default 3)
Options.-skip-idle-start: (STRATEGY: BLUE-GREEN) Directly start the new MTA version as 'live', skipping the 'idle' phase of the resources. Do not require further confirmation or testing before deleting the old version
Options.-skip-testing-phase: (STRATEGY: BLUE-GREEN) Do not require confirmation for deleting the previously deployed MTA app
Options.-strategy: Specify the deployment strategy when updating an mta (default, blue-green)
Options.-verify-archive-signature: Verify the archive is correctly signed
Options.a: Action to perform on active deploy operation (abort, retry, resume, monitor)
Options.f: Force deploy without confirmation for aborting conflicting processes
Options.m: Deploy list of modules which are contained in the deployment descriptor, in the current location
Options.r: Deploy list of resources which are contained in the deployment descriptor, in the current location

Commands.Name: bg-deploy
Commands.HelpText: Deploy a multi-target app using blue-green deployment

UsageDetails.Usage:
Deploy a multi-target app using blue-green deployment
   cf bg-deploy MTA [-e EXT_DESCRIPTOR[,...]] [-t TIMEOUT] [--version-rule VERSION_RULE] [-u URL] [-f] [--retries RETRIES] [--no-start] [--namespace NAMESPACE] [--delete-services] [--delete-service-keys] [--delete-service-brokers] [--keep-files] [--no-restart-subscribed-apps] [--no-confirm] [--skip-idle-start] [--do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions] [--abort-on-error] [--verify-archive-signature]

   Perform action on an active deploy operation
   cf deploy -i OPERATION_ID -a ACTION [-u URL]

Options.-abort-on-error: Auto-abort the process on any errors
Options.-delete-service-keys: Delete existing service keys and apply the new ones
Options.-delete-services: Recreate changed services / delete discontinued services
Options.-do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions: Do not fail on missing permissions for admin operations
Options.-namespace: (EXPERIMENTAL) Namespace for the mta, applied to app and service names as well
Options.-no-confirm: Do not require confirmation for deleting the previously deployed MTA apps
Options.-no-restart-subscribed-apps: Do not restart subscribed apps, updated during the deployment
Options.-retries: Retry the operation N times in case a non-content error occurs (default 3)
Options.-skip-idle-start: Directly start the new MTA version as 'live', skipping the 'idle' phase of the resources. Do not require further confirmation or testing before deleting the old version
Options.-verify-archive-signature: Verify the archive is correctly signed
Options.a: Action to perform on active deploy operation (abort, retry, resume, monitor)
Options.f: Force deploy without confirmation for aborting conflicting processes

Commands.Name: download-mta-op-logs
Commands.HelpText: Download logs of multi-target app operation

UsageDetails.Usage:
cf download-mta-op-logs -i OPERATION_ID [-d DIRECTORY] [-u URL]

   cf download-mta-op-logs --mta MTA [--last NUM] [-d DIRECTORY] [-u URL]

Options.-last: Downloads last NUM operation logs. If not specified, logs for each process with the specified MTA_ID are downloaded
Options.d: Root directory to download logs, by default the current working directory

UsageDetails.Usage:
Undeploy a multi-target app
   cf undeploy MTA_ID [-u URL] [-f] [--retries RETRIES] [--namespace NAMESPACE] [--delete-services] [--delete-service-keys] [--delete-service-brokers] [--no-restart-subscribed-apps] [--do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions] [--abort-on-error]

   Perform action on an active undeploy operation
   cf undeploy -i OPERATION_ID -a ACTION [-u URL]

Options.-abort-on-error: Auto-abort the process on any errors
Options.-do-not-fail-on-missing-permissions: Do not fail on missing permissions for admin operations
Options.-namespace: (EXPERIMENTAL) Specify the (optional) namespace the target mta is in
Options.-no-restart-subscribed-apps: Do not restart subscribed apps, updated during the undeployment
Options.-retries: Retry the operation N times in case a non-content error occurs (default 3)
Options.a: Action to perform on the active undeploy operation (abort, retry, monitor)

Commands.Name: mta
Commands.HelpText: Display health and status for a multi-target app

Options.-namespace: (EXPERIMENTAL) namespace of the requested mta, empty by default

Options.-all: List all operations, not just the active ones

Commands.Name: purge-mta-config
Commands.HelpText: Purge no longer valid configuration entries
